com.arangodb.springframework.repository.query.derived

Class DerivedQueryCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.repository.query.parser.AbstractQueryCreator<String,ConjunctionBuilder>
      • com.arangodb.springframework.repository.query.derived.DerivedQueryCreator

  • public class DerivedQueryCreator
extends org.springframework.data.repository.query.parser.AbstractQueryCreator<String,ConjunctionBuilder>
    Creates a full AQL query from a PartTree and ArangoParameterAccessor
